titleStmt.title: Śaraṇāgatidīpikā, Sudarśanaśatakam, Ṣoḍaśāyudastutiḥ, Śudarśanāṣṭakam, Nakṣatranighaṇṭu, Hayagrīvasahasranāma, Śrīraṅgarājastavam and one unknown text.

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

summary.p: This manuscript contains 8 different texts, one of which is unkown. The right margins are broken. Thin palm leaf is used as a cover. The last folio has spots and the writing is faded, making it difficult to read in places.

On the front cover the number 59 is written on the left margin in pink chalk.
sudarśanaśatarma śaraṇāgatidīdīpikai ṣoḍaśasuyastuti sudarśanāṣṭakam aṣṭapadī 24 śrīguṇaratnakośaṃ śrīraṃgarajantivaṭavṛśottaraśatakam ṅakṣatra nirvana śrīhayagrīvasahasranāmaṃ | The actual arrangement of the texts in the manuscript deviates from this order.

At the end of the fifth text, the Nakṣatranighaṇṭu, a few lines are scribbled in Grantha script, of which some words are unclear. The other part of the folio has hasty hand writing and seems to be related to astrology. The numeration is continuous. The text found after the Nakṣatranighaṇṭu is as follows:

ādyāśnirukṣu ghṛhyate vedān ravidurśajakṛt vasuṣo
ḍaśeṣu One table, 4 columns and 4 lines 1 athakubhaundapa 2 oḍava 3 ḍana 4 kuḥtsa
piṇḍākṣaramantrāṇām siddhādīnaiva
śodhayet || Folio 12v is half blank.

msItem.title: Śaraṇāgatidīpikā
msItem.author: Vedāntadeśika
msItem.rubric:
śrīmānveṃkaṭāryaḥ kavitārkikakesarī vedāntacāryyavaryo me sannidattāṃ sadā hṛdi || śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ | śrīmate vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmattriśailāgryamahādeśi
kāyanamaḥ
msItem.incipit: padmāpate svastipadena vivicyamānaṃ paśyantv iha prapadana pravaṇā mahāntaḥ
msItem.explicit: tattvaṃ pratyāsīdadvimuktānubhavapalamutbhedalabdhavat kṛtārthaṃ prāpte bijasya bhede pariṇḍamati parabrahma sat satbrahmacāri 60
msItem.finalRubric:
iti
kavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmatveṃkaṭanāthasyavedāntācāryyasya kṛtiṣu śaraṇāgatidīpikā saṃpūrṇā || śrīyai namaḥ ||

msItem.title: Śudarśanaśatakam
msItem.incipit:
trayaścakremunipuṃgavaḥ tamahaṃviduṣāṃ varyyasukṛto rāyaṇ bhaje raṃgeśavijñaptikarāmayasya cakāra śa
keśa nutiṃ nivṛtyai samāśraye haṃ varapūraṇīṃ yaḥ taṃ kūranārāyaṇanāmakaṃ muniṃ saudarśanyujjihānā diśi vidiśi tiraskṛtya sāvitramarci
msItem.explicit: kuranārāñaṇena stotraṃ nirviṣṭabhogo bhajati sa paramāṃ cakrasāyujyalakṣmīṃ 100
msItem.finalRubric: hariḥ oṃ śrīmate nigamānta mahādeśikāya namaḥ

msItem.title: Ṣoḍaśāyudastutiḥ
msItem.incipit: svasaṃkalpakalākalpairāyudhair āyudheśvaraḥ juṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśībhirdīvyaiḥ juṣatāṃ vaḥ paraḥ pumān | 1 | yadā yattaṃ jagaccakraṃ kālaccakrañca śāśvataṃ pātu
msItem.explicit: so vyāt saudarśano viśvamāyudhairṣoḍaśāyudhaḥ | 18 |śrīmatveṅkaṭanāthena śreyase bhūyase satāṃ kṛteyamāyudhendrasya ṣoḍaśāyudhasaṃstutiḥ 19
msItem.finalRubric: iti śrīkavitā || ṣoḍaśayudastutiḥ saṃpūrṇā || śrīmate vedāntagurave namaḥ

msItem.title: Śudarśanāṣṭakam
msItem.incipit: bahirrantasthamacchedi jyotirvande sudarśanaṃ vetāvyī hatāsaṃkalpaṃ vastu lakṣmīdharaṃ viduḥ || pratibhaṭaśreṇī bhīṣaṇa varaguṇastomabhūṣaṇajagadavasthā
msItem.explicit: daṃ prabhūtasāraṃ paṭhatāṃ veṃkaṭanāyakapraṇītaṃ viṣame 'pi manorathaḥ pradhāvanna vihaneta rathāṅgadhūryaguptaḥ ||

msItem.title: Nakṣatranighaṇṭu
msItem.incipit: athātra tārakādīnāṃ nighaṇṭurśīkṣyate mayā || bha śvininakṣatraṃ āvitalaṃ
msItem.explicit: ca va āvirbhūyatu nigamataḥ | pādyaṃ pauṣṇamityāhuḥ antyaṃ puṣā ca revatī

msItem.title: Hayagrīvasahasranāma
msItem.incipit: oṃ tāta me śrīhayagrīvanāmnāṃ sāhasramuttamam | adhyetuṃ jāyate kāṅkṣā tatprasīda mayi prabho
msItem.explicit: saṃpat sārsvatādhīkaḥ | iti hayavadanānan āravindān madhulaharīva nirgalā galanti | jagati daśaśati tadīyanāmānāṃ jayati jaḍānapi gīrṣu javayanti | śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ | śrīmatśrīśailāyyamahādeśīkāya namaḥ | śrīmate nimāntagurave namaḥ | śrīyai namaḥ |

msItem.title: Śrīraṅgarājastavam
msItem.rubric: śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ | śrīman śrīśailāyyamahādeśikāya namaḥ | śrīraṃganāyakyai namaḥ |
msItem.incipit:
śrīmān veṅkaṭanāthāyya kavītārkīkakesarī vedāntācāryyavarryo me sannidattāṃ
sadā hṛdi | śrīparāśarabhaṭṭāryyaḥ śrīraṃgeśapurohitaḥ | śrīvatsāṃkasutaśrīmān śreyase me 'stu bhuyase || śrīyai samastavida
msItem.explicit: 104 || tvanṃīnapānīyyanayenadharmadhībhaktivairā(gyī)gyajuṣau bibharṣi | raṅgeśa mā pāṃsi mitapaṃcaṃ yat pāniyyaśālamarubhuṣu tat syāt || 105

msItem.title: Unknown text
msItem.incipit: śrīman śrīśailāyya mahādeśikāya namaḥ | śrīraṃganāyakyai namaḥ | sakalakavijanāṃ bhāsasu lokāvalaṃbā

support.p: Thin palm leaf used as cover.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin of the verso. New numeration for the individual text. Folios are not numbered for the text.
supportDesc.condition: Good. Some folios with faint ink, so they are difficult to read.

handNote.desc: Good hand writing but, due to faint ink and sometimes due to brown patches on the folios, the text is not readable.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is the written in the left margin on text1-1r and text2-1r.
In the sixth text, 1r, in the left margin hayagrīvasahasranāma is written.
jvālāvarṇanaṃ hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on the second text 1v.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

revisionDesc.change: In the explicits of text 1 and 2 what do the numbers 60 and 100 stand for? The Śudarśanāṣṭakam is missing a catalogue reference. Best, Riccardo
